means.word_mean: 1. a group of Chadic languages spoken in the border area between Cameroon and Nigeria south of Lake Chad

auth_sentence.content: Earlier on Tuesday, police blamed Boko Haram for the shooting death of a rival cleric in the town of Biu, north of Maiduguru.
auth_sentence.res_content: Earlier on Tuesday, police blamed Boko Haram for the shooting death of a rival cleric in the town of Biu, north of Maiduguru.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Earlier on Tuesday, police blamed Boko Haram for the shooting death of a rival cleric in the town of Biu, north of Maiduguru.

auth_sentence.content: Riots broke out on Wednesday after the killing of the woman in the northern town of Biu and a church was set on fire.
